articles.title: Utopia Has Been Cancelled After One Season at Amazon - Gizmodo
articles.description: After fairly poor reception all around, Amazon has announced that Utopia won’t be getting a second season.
articles.content:
The original British version of Utopia, Gillian Flynns conspiracy theory thriller, had a two-season run. Amazons adaptation/remake isnt getting the same luck.
